summary: Adds new craft system and set of new swords (katana (long sword), 2-handed katana, wakizashi (short sword), tanto (dagger)) to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]THIS MOD IS A FREE PRODUCT, CREATED OUT OF A PERSONAL LOVE FOR SKYRIM AND WITH RESPECT TO COMMUNITY. AS SUCH, THIS MOD WILL ALWAYS REMAIN FREE OF CHARGE, AND I DO NOT WANT ANY OF THIS MOD'S ASSETS TO BE USED FOR THE PAID MODS ON THE STEAM WORKSHOP; THAT INCLUDES THE 3D MODELS, TEXTURES AND EVEN ESP/ESM FILES AS MASTER DEPENDENCIES.[/size][/b][/center]

[img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/3331/scr02y.jpg[/img]

[center][youtube]KNaluactA2o[/youtube][/center]
[center]-=THANKS to dinojjw for video guide=-[/center]

[img]http://img815.imageshack.us/img815/8328/title01.png[/img]

-Adds new craft system and set of new swords (katana (long sword), 2-handed katana, wakizashi (short sword), tanto (dagger)) to the game.

-Each of the swords is unique and consists of realistic high detail parts (crafted from many smaller parts like real katana).

-Plugin adds 27 unique models to craft those swords.

-Swords are using new unique blood textures.

[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/8373/scr01u.jpg[/img]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img14/2374/qdnx.png[/img]

To craft swords you have to get the "Ancient akaviri book" and keep it in your inventory until craft anything. Once you throw it away you unable to see items to craft at smelter,forge or cookpot. Check "Sleeping Giant Inn" in Riverwood to find book.

To craft "Tamahagane plates" you must use smelter.
To craft dyes you must use cookpot.
To craft "Mudcrab skin" use forge.
To craft other parts of katana you must use Smithing forge.
Apothecary traders sell list has been upgraded with "same" and "tundra cotton" to help players find ingredients for craft.
Jewel traders sell list has been upgraded with "Diamond" and "Flawless diamond" to help players find ingredients for craft.
To get "firewood" ingredient chop any firewood in Skyrim.

For upgrading swords you will need "diamond dust" which can be crafted from diamonds.


1-handed Onihime Katana stats:
*Blade length 79 cm
*Handle length 31 cm
*Damage 17
*Speed 1
*Reach 1
*Crit DMG 7
*Weight 16

2-handed Onihime Katana stats:
*Blade length 79 cm
*Handle length 31 cm
*Damage 20
*Speed 1
*Reach 1
*Crit DMG 9
*Weight 16

Onihime wakizashi stats:
*Blade length 59 cm
*Handle length 20 cm
*Damage 15
*Speed 1.2
*Reach 0.85
*Crit DMG 6
*Weight 11

Onihime tanto stats:
*Blade length 39 cm
*Handle length 15 cm
*Damage 13
*Speed 1.4
*Reach 0.7
*Crit DMG 5
*Weight 6

Thats all. Enjoy new swords ^_-

[img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/7471/scr03l.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/4347/ntitle01.png[/img]

UPDATE: Mod is fully compatible with Advanced Craft V1.2 and higher/

v1.2:

-Fixed problem when player can't enhace/sharpen the sword to legendary (only flawless) (thanks to anykiller83 for noticing problem).
-Swords can be crafted in forge from "steel" section.
-Sword parts can be crafted in forge at "different" section.

Adv craft v1.2 changes:

Craft system corrected with steps for easy crafting.
Added craftable item "Mudcrab skin (Black)" (Can be crafted in forge. Recipe: 2x Mudcrab chitin; 1x Black Dye)
Added craftable item "Sageo (White)" (Can be crafted in forge. Recipe: 5x Tundra Cotton)
Added inner side texture for black and white same (mudcrab skin)

v1.1:

-New ingredient "Mudcrab skin" cant be found by hunting mudcrabs, but it craftable at forge instead.

[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4840/ntitle02.png[/img]

Check "Sleeping Giant Inn" in Riverwood to get "Ancient akaviri book" (Recipe to craft swords and its parts).

[img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/6019/scr04q.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/2603/ntitle03.png[/img]

***Nexus Mod Manager Install:

To successfully instal mod you have to:

1) Download both archives
2) Install First archive (Odems Advanced Craft)
3) Install Second archive (Odems Onihime) AND choose NO when you see "upgrade" window:

"A diffirent version of Odems Onihime Katana - Advanced Craft has bee detected. The installed version is 1.1, the new version is 1.1. Would you like to upgrade? Selecting No will install the new Mod normally."

***Manual Install:

1. Install "Odems Advanced Craft" plugin (version 1.0 or higher) before install this mod

2. Install Odems Onihime:
3. Extract the files to a temporary location.
4. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
5. Copy files to (install folder)Steamsteamappscommonskyrimdata
6. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the OdemsAdvCraft.esm (version 1.0 or higher).
7. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the OdemsOnihime.esp.

[img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/3388/ntitle04.png[/img]

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the OdemsAdvCraft.esm and OdemsOnihime.esp.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod (See Readme for details)

[img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/6651/ntitle05.png[/img]

Email: odemhouse@gmail.com

[img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/4058/ntitle06.png[/img]

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

[img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/7796/ntitle07.png[/img]

Cinema 4D
Autodesk 3ds Max 2010
Photoshop CS6
Nifskope v1.1.0-rc7-i686-w32
Niftools max plugins v3.7.3

[img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/548/ntitle08.png[/img]

You may use this as you wish as long as all conditions are met:

1) as you don't charge money for it
2) as you credit and notify me for any work used
3) as you use it for Skyrim only

Please do not re-host this file without my explicit permission.
No upload to Steam Workshop.
author: Odem
